SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameSubject
public class Board extends Object implements GameSubject
The main class of the model.
Represents the central board visible by all players.
Acts as the first point of access to the model.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board() throws IllegalStateException
      Constructs the Board (as in initializing the game)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if an error occurs while initializing board

    • Board

      public Board(Board oldBoard, List<Player> players) throws InvalidParameterException, IllegalStateException
      Constructs the board (as in initializing the game) and automatically makes the given players join
      Parameters:
      oldBoard - board used in the previous match
      players - list of 1-4 players that are joining this game
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - if the list of players has an illegal player count (0 or >4)
      IllegalStateException - if players contains duplicates or an error occurs while initializing board

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentTurn

      public int getCurrentTurn()
      Returns the current turn. Current turn represents the turn that still has to be played.
      Returns:
      current turn.

    • setCurrentTurn

      public void setCurrentTurn(int currentTurn)
      Sets the current turn.
      Parameters:
      currentTurn - turn that has to be played

    • nextTurn

      public boolean nextTurn()
      Increments currentTurn, unless it's the last turn (turn == num players) in which case it sets currentTurn to 1.
      If a player is disconnected, skips that player's turn.
      If a player can't place any cards for lack of free corners, skips that player's turn.
      Returns:
      - true if the game can continue in the next turn
      - false if the game can't continue because all players are deadlocked or disconnected

    • getGamePhase

      public GamePhase getGamePhase()
      Returns the current game phase.
      Returns:
      current game phase

    • setGamePhase

      public void setGamePhase(GamePhase gamePhase)
      Sets the current game phase.
      Parameters:
      gamePhase - current game phase

    • getPlayerAreas

      public Map<Player,PlayArea> getPlayerAreas()
      Returns the map of player areas.
      Returns:
      map of player areas

    • getPlayerDeadlocks

      public Map<Player,Boolean> getPlayerDeadlocks()
      Returns the map of the players' deadlock status.
      Returns:
      player's deadlock status map

    • getScoreboard

      public Map<Player,Integer> getScoreboard()
      Returns the scoreboard map, associating players with their scores.
      Returns:
      scoreboard

    • getAvailableColors

      public Set<PlayerColor> getAvailableColors()
      Returns a set of all colors that have not yet been chosen.
      Returns:
      set of all colors that have not yet been chosen by a player

    • getRandomAvailableColor

      public PlayerColor getRandomAvailableColor() throws IllegalStateException
      Returns a random color among colors that have not yet been chosen by a player.
      Returns:
      a random available color
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException

    • addScore

      public void addScore(Player player, int amount) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds points to player's score
      Parameters:
      player - player to whom the points will be awarded
      amount - number of points to award
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player isn't in game

    • setScore

      protected void setScore(Player player, int score)
      Sets specified player's score.
      Parameters:
      player - player whose score has changed
      score - player's updated score

    • checkEndgame

      public boolean checkEndgame()
      Returns true if any player has a score >= ENDGAME_SCORE or if both decks are empty, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if one of the two endgame conditions is checked

    • setPlayerDeadLock

      public void setPlayerDeadLock(Player player, boolean isDeadLocked)
      Sets player deadlock status.
      Parameters:
      player - specified player
      isDeadLocked - true if player cannot place any more cards, false otherwise

    • canDraw

      public boolean canDraw()
      Returns true if there is at least one card to draw on the board (among revealed cards or top deck).
      Returns:
      true if there is at least one card to draw on the board (among revealed cards or top deck)

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(Player player, PlayCard card, Corner corner) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
      Places the given card on the given corner on player's playArea
      Also removes the given card from player's hand
      Parameters:
      player - the player doing the placement action
      card - the card to be placed
      corner - the corner on which to place card
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if player isn't in game, card isn't in player's hand or corner is occupied
      IllegalStateException - if the placement is invalid (as per PlayArea.updatePlaceCard())

    • placeStartingCard

      public void placeStartingCard(Player player, boolean placeOnFront) throws IllegalStateException
      Places the player's starting card on their playArea
      Parameters:
      player - the player doing the placement action
      placeOnFront - the facing on which to place the player's starting card
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the action is invalid (e.g. if the player hasn't received a startingCard yet or has already placed it)

    • deal

      public void deal(char deck, PlayerHand playerHand) throws IllegalStateException
      Deals cards from the specified deck to player's hand
      If deal() is called for dealing the objective cards, then two objective cards are dealt.
      If deal() is called for dealing the starting card, then one starting card is dealt.
      Parameters:
      deck - A character indicating the deck from which to deal the cards
      it is advised to use Board.STARTING_DECK or Board.OBJECTIVE_DECK constants to select the deck
      playerHand - which hand to deal the card(s) to
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the deck specified isn't Board.STARTING_DECK or Board.OBJECTIVE_DECK
      or if dealing the requested cards to player's hand is an invalid action

    • getRevealedObjectives

      public List<ObjectiveCard> getRevealedObjectives()
      Returns a list of the two revealed shared objectives card on the board.
      Returns:
      list of revealed objectives on the board

    • drawTop

      public void drawTop(char deck, PlayerHand playerHand) throws IllegalStateException, DeckException, PlayerHandException
      Draws one card from the top of the specified deck
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck from which to draw
      playerHand - the hand where the drawn card will be put
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if playerHand is full (already has 3 cards) or if the specified deck isn't Board.RESOURCE_DECK or Board.GOLD_DECK
      DeckException - if the specified deck is empty
      PlayerHandException - if the card drawn is (for some error/bug) already in playerHand

    • drawFirst

      public void drawFirst(char deck, PlayerHand playerHand) throws IllegalStateException, DeckException, PlayerHandException
      Draws the first card revealed in front of the specified deck.
      Automatically reveals a card to replace the one that was drawn
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck from which to draw
      playerHand - the hand where the drawn card will be put
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if playerHand is full (already has 3 cards) or if the specified deck isn't Board.RESOURCE_DECK or Board.GOLD_DECK
      DeckException - if the specified deck is empty
      PlayerHandException - if the card drawn is (for some error/bug) already in playerHand

    • drawSecond

      public void drawSecond(char deck, PlayerHand playerHand) throws IllegalStateException, DeckException, PlayerHandException
      Draws the second card revealed in front of the specified deck.
      Automatically reveals a card to replace the one that was drawn
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck from which to draw
      playerHand - the hand where the drawn card will be put
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if playerHand is full (already has 3 cards) or if the specified deck isn't Board.RESOURCE_DECK or Board.GOLD_DECK
      DeckException - if the specified deck is empty
      PlayerHandException - if the card drawn is (for some error/bug) already in playerHand

      public void revealObjectives()
      Reveals shared objectives.

      list of players ordered by their score

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer() throws IllegalStateException
      Returns the player whose turn corresponds to the current turn.
      Returns:
      player whose turn corresponds to the current turn
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if turns have not been assigned turns yet (no player has turned = currentTurn >= 1)

    • getPlayerByNickname

      public Player getPlayerByNickname(String nickname) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns player instance associated with the specified identifier
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's nickname
      Returns:
      the player instance of the player with given nickname
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is no player in this game with the given nickname

    • isOnePlayerRemaining

      public boolean isOnePlayerRemaining()
      Returns true if only one player is connected, false otherwise
      Returns:
      true if only one player is connected, false otherwise

    • getNumOfConnectedPlayers

      public int getNumOfConnectedPlayers()
      Returns the number of connected players in this game (0-4).
      Returns:
      number of connected players in this game

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player) throws NullPointerException, IllegalStateException
      Adds a player to the game
      Parameters:
      player - player that is joining the game
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the player had already joined or if the current game is full (4 players)
      NullPointerException

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String nickname) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Removes the player with given nickname from the game (deleting all his information) Should only be called during Creation or Join states.
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's nickname
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is no player in this game with the given nickname

    • disconnectPlayer

      public void disconnectPlayer(String nickname) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Disconnects player with given nickname without removing their information from the board
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's nickname
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is no player with given nickname

    • reconnectPlayer

      public void reconnectPlayer(String nickname) throws IllegalStateException, IllegalArgumentException
      Reconnects player with given nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - player's nickname
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if player is already connected
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is no player with given nickname
